sources.title: Appassionata (1974) Gabriele Ferzetti, Ornella Muti, Eleonora Giorgi (Italian Film)
sources.description:
Deep inside every young girl burns the passion of a woman...
A married dentist gets embroiled in a sexual affair with his teenage daughter's best friend. Meanwhile, his wife's mental health is deteriorating, and his daughter is desperate for an affair of her own.

Original title: Appassionata (1974) AKA: Passionate

This film has italian audio & many subtitles

Director: Gianluigi Calderone
Writers: Gianluigi Calderone, Alessandro Parenzo, Domenico Rafele & Carla Mancin
Stars: Gabriele Ferzetti, Ornella Muti, Eleonora Giorgi
Genres:  Italian cinema, Drama


@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Two teenage friends conspire to find out how much their youthful sensuality can disrupt one of their households, headed by a dentist and his mentally-ill wife.
metadata.Writer: Gianluigi Calderone, Alessandro Parenzo, Domenico Rafele
metadata.Actors: Gabriele Ferzetti, Ornella Muti, Eleonora Giorgi
